description:
Yoshitake is a first year female student who decided to join Genshiken after seeing Ogiue`s poster drawing demonstration and sensing the fujoshi aspects of it and recognizing Ogiue as a fujoshi. She is slender, wears glasses, is bright and cheerful, but is also a bit manipulative as seen when she got everyone to cosplay, a feat even Oono could not accomplish. Yoshitake became one of Ogiue`s paid assistants when Ogiue needed help getting her professional manga ready by the deadline.
Source: Wiki
name: Yoshitake Rika
